channel.title: I need some help here with a command will rep++

item.title: I need some help here with a command will rep++
item.dc:creator: @tomjrmkay tomjrmkay
item.description:
@tomjrmkay wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("agilitylol")) {
If(CHECK TO SEE IF THEY HAVE 100K){				                c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), 100000);
								c.getPA().addSkillXP(100000,16);
} else {
								c.sendMessage("You need 100k to do this.");
								        
}
}

item.title: I need some help here with a command will rep++

item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

[quote=“Mi K ey, post:2, topic:399279”]not sure but you can always try this

                                            if (playerCommand.startsWith("agilitylol")) {
                                                            c.getPA().addSkillXP(100000,16);
                                                            return;
                                                            } else {
                                                            }[/quote]

That will give the player free xp, its supposed to be 100k.

item.title: I need some help here with a command will rep++
item.dc:creator: @Mi_K_ey Mi K ey
item.description:
@Mi_K_ey wrote:

i failed :S

but you can take a look from what i got.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("agilitylol")) { c.getItem().getItemSlot(995, 100000); c.getItem().deleteItem(995, 100000); c.sendMessage("You need 100k to do this."); c.getPA().addSkillXP(100000,16); return; } else { }

item.title: I need some help here with a command will rep++
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

I tried adding something like this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("agilitylol")) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), 100000); c.getPA().addSkillXP(100000,16); return; } else { c.sendMessage("You need 100k to do this."); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), 100000); }

IT worked, but you can do it without the cash, how to fix?
